title: I cant comment on anything in team recruitment
body: For some reason i was looking at team recruitment today and i found a team that i wanted to apply for basically. The site keeps on saying i cant comment on it because i am not over lvl 6. Even tho i am lvl 30 and have already played over 100 games in ranked. Can someone plz explain what is going on with this or let me know how it can be fixed?

replies.body: Your Boards Profile may have been out of sync, but it looks like it's updated since your post here.  Your profile appears as level 30 now!  Hooray!
